## Learning Objectives

By the end of this lecture, you will be able to:

- define and use vocabulary related to probability including sample space, outcome, random variable, disjoint/mutually exclusive events, independent and dependent events,  complement of an event.
- apply probability addition and multiplication rule when appropriate.
- check whether a function meets probability axioms.
- calculate conditional, marginal, and joint probabilities.
- use Bayes rule for events
